content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: DeleteMonitor path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/monitoring/v2/stacks/{stack_id}/monitors/{monitor_id} content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name monitorid
desc a monitor id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum delete a monitor
responses
title: 14_Monitors_DeleteMonitor_76.json
